scenario_text.value:
I see... Everyone’s taken less damage than
expected.

Now that we know your past, you’re still you,
Professor. Nothing’s changed.

That’s good... I wouldn’t be surprised if
they all hated me.

If you were so worried, you should’ve kept
the truth hidden.

No, I couldn’t do that just because it would
be inconvenient for me...

I just can’t. If I did, I couldn’t face any
of you all again.

Would you lend me your strength just a bit
longer, Takuma, my boy?
Yeah! We’ll rescue your partner, then Miyuki!
(Seeing the Professor tear up as he spoke...)
(Lets me know he’s telling the truth.)
